Author: DistractedBones
Text: Binging happens to people with and without EDs. It could also just be considered disordered eating. it's mostly from restricting your food intake and your body overpowering your mind to get you to eat. Some people also eat because of emotional reasons.  If you eat in a more sustainable way then you can lose weight without the binges. If your able to, please try to stop this behavior. people get get trapped in this mentally, this isn't a good way to go.   If I knew we're I was headed when I started I would like to think I could have stopped or at least get help doing so.
